original_text: However, when the Israelites grew stronger, they subjected the Canaanites to forced labor but did not drive them out completely.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 강성한 후에야 가나안 족속에게 노역을 시켰고 다 쫓아내지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: However, when the Israelites grew stronger
they subjected the Canaanites to forced labor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가나안 사람들을 강제 노동에 종속시켰다

sentences.original_text: but did not drive them out completely
